findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop. Details: https://sg.run/r4LJ

findings.name: state-variable-read-in-a-loop
findings.message: -a-loop Replace state variable reads and writes within loops with local variable reads and writes. Details: https://sg.run/xADy

findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
findings.message: hecked-arithmetic-in-loop A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks. Details: https://sg.run/OvDk

findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
findings.message: hecked-arithmetic-in-loop A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks. Details: https://sg.run/OvDk

findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
findings.message: t-not-postfix Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas. Details: https://sg.run/nxLr

findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
findings.message: t-not-postfix Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas. Details: https://sg.run/nxLr

findings.name: balancer-readonly-reentrancy-getpooltokens
findings.message: donly-reentrancy-getpooltokens IBalancerVault(balancerVault).getPoolTokens() call on a Balancer pool is not protected from the read-only reentrancy. Details: https://sg.run/803Q
